name: characterize
content:

Something that characterizes another thing is typical of it: Bright colours and bold strokes characterize his early paintings.
to describe something by stating its main qualities: In her essay, she characterizes the whole era as a period of radical change.

to have as a typical quality: The current system is characterized by obsolete technology.
To characterize something also means to describe it by stating its main qualities: She characterized the novel as wordy in places but very funny.
